attributes.action: allow the Opt-out of Catholics from the new gay rights laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Forcing people to act against their consciences, in this case asking Catholics to allow the adoption of children to same sex couples, would mean discrimination on the grounds of belief

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow the Opt-out of Catholics from the new gay rights laws."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14724.asp

Prime Minister's Office
